name: Gironella motorhome area
title: (08680) Gironella motorhome area
description: Motorhome reception area with capacity for 14 vehicles. It has 8 power outlets. There is also a drainage area for gray and black water, as well as the loading of water, all gartuito. The area is very quiet, it has many services such as a paddle tennis court, a circuit for bike trials with children, a soccer field, a volleyball court, a sports center and in summer spectacular swimming pools for the whole family, one of them is Olympic. A 7-minute walk takes you to the main avenue with all the offer of high-quality local shops, you can also access a couple of large supermarkets. Also 7 minutes away you can access the historic part of the town where you can walk through the stone streets and unique buildings. You can do 3 simple routes, the route of the fountains, a historical walk, or the route of modernism. We also recommend doing the section of the “Ruta de les colònies” that passes along the Llobregat river side and can be started 1 minute from the area.

title: (08680) Gironella - 57P Avinguda Països Catalans
description: Good place to sleep peacefully in front of the football field and the swimming pools, in the football field if it is open they let you use the services without problem, near Gironella town center.

title: (08698) Sant Corneli - Carrer Porvenir 2ᵃ
description:
Museum car park (former mining settlement). Very quiet place. Tables and water nearby (100 m).
The Cercs town hall has installed an area for AC, (2 places), to empty black water and fill water. To empty grays you have to do it on the grate on the floor of the sewer, in the middle of the parking lot.
You can stay up to a maximum of 48 hours. All free, except electricity (3 euros per day). Restaurant & Bar/shop nearby (50m).

title: (08618) Castellar del Riu -
description: Wonderful place in the middle of nature. It is about 2 kilometers of dirt road, but there is a very steep descent, with holes that I had a lot of trouble climbing with a small van. I left my wheels spinning and I was quite scared thinking I was going to crash. Only for very experienced or 4x4 drivers. I had a bad time. I won't repeat it again. Next time I will stay right in the upper area, which is nice (although there are usually people) but without surprises hehe

Also in the area there are several hermitages in the style of Santa Magdalena. Also in the house we have animals that you can meet. Cows, chickens, rabbits, sheep, goats...

description: It is a service area for sewage and drinking water, but I suggest not parking since by doing so we block the area for other users, there is a more level and quiet parking lot on the soccer fields, there you can spend the night without problem

title: (08697) Saldes - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet area at the foot of a canyon and 10 'by car from the start of the Pedraforca. Ideal for all motorhomes.

title: (08697) Feners -
description: Dirt apartment without services on the edge of the road. There is a container. Spacious and very quiet. Nice views. Passing Saldes, take the detour towards Serra d'Ensija. A few meters to the left is this place.

title: (08695) Bagà - 85 Carrer del Raval
description: Night in Raval de Bagà street. Fairly quiet.

title: (08697) Saldes - 18 B-400
description: Park next to the municipal swimming pools and the basketball and soccer fields. It is next to a campsite the eppp campsite is private and the use of the facilities is prohibited during the summer the parking lot is full of cars use the swimming pools Keep in mind that it is not possible to access at the campsite or to use the services. It is a private campsite. In summer, the parking lot fills up with cars and the use of showers and toilets by the swimming pool is allowed

title: (08695) Bagà - 20 Carrrer del Pintor de Soto
title_short: (08695) Bagà - 20 Carrrer del Pintor de Soto
description: Parking for about 50 vehicles, very quiet and well accessible

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
description: This unusual building by Antonio Gaudi stands in the middle of nowhere. Absolute peace reigns here at an altitude of over 1300m. Flat pitches with no other extras. 2 km to the Mirador. DO NOT drive up from Lillet with a motorhome. Too narrow, too steep and in bad condition. Access only from the Diseminado Santuari Sta Mare Folgars overnight stay, west of it.

title: (08697) Saldes - Carrer Santa Bàrbara
description: Parking at the entrance of Saldes. there is a night prohibition sign.

title: (08607) Sant Jaume de Frontanyà - 1 Carrer Abajo
title_short: (08607) Sant Jaume de Frontanyà - 1 Carrer Abajo
description: It is said that it is the smallest town in Catalonia, beautiful, perfect to pay for the weekend or more. Without services, a bit uncluttered but I don't know how it is.

title: (08694) Sant Julià de Cerdanyola -
description:
Open meadow 80 m from the track and a little before the car park and the entrance to the nature reserve
No cows today!
4x4 only
Away from everything: only the songs of birds and cowbells in the distance

title: (08697) Saldes - Carretera del mirador de Gresolet / Refugi Lluís Estasen
title_short: (08697) Saldes - Carretera del mirador de Gresolet / Refugi Lluís Estasen
description:
We have slept here. Very quiet, in front of a water basin. When we arrived there were cows.
Several campers and motorhomes fit. There is a difference in level, it is not flat, we recommend falcas. In the morning we have reached the viewpoint of Gresolet

address.street: Carretera del mirador de Gresolet / Refugi Lluís Estasen

title: (25716) Gósol - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place at the top of a plateau. With great views. No service.

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet -
description: A spot on a dead end track, we stayed here with no trouble for a night, no signs saying it was prohibited. Remember to take rubbish with you!

name: Camping Bastareny
title: (08695) Camping Bastareny
description: Small campsite with minimum services.

title: (08695) Bagà - Camí de Gisclareny
description: Recreation area with about 5 seats, with barbecues and picnic tables. Beginning of many excursions. There is a source where you can take water if you have a wireless faucet adapter.

title: (08697) Saldes - B-400
description: Plana del Reig picnic area (former Espà viewpoint). Perfect for spending the day and it can be done overnight. Very calm.

title: (08697) Saldes - Carretera del mirador de Gresolet / Refugi Lluís Estasen
title_short: (08697) Saldes - Carretera del mirador de Gresolet / Refugi Lluís Estasen
description: Parking without services. A good alternative to the Mirador del Gresolet car park, as it is usually full.

address.street: Carretera del mirador de Gresolet / Refugi Lluís Estasen

title: (17513) Les Llosses - Unnamed Road
description: Just 100 meters from the main asphalt track. Accessible by van via dirt road.

title: (08695) Bagà - Vias Verdes del Nicolau
description: Place to park with the van, AC, next to the Ecomuseu de Sant Joan de l'Avellanet. Start of Via Nicolau. Little traveled and flat to spend the night. Recommended, 3km from the town with shops and all services.

title: (25286) Navès - Unnamed Road
description: Lloc tranquil amb bones vistes i carretera accesible.   quiet place with good views and accessible road.

name: Camping Saiol
title: (17512) Camping Saiol
description: Camping Saiol - Natural landscape in the middle of the mountain right next to a beautiful river to bathe. Camping Bonito, cheap and well equipped.

title: (08695) Bagà -
description: Quiet place, next to a road with little traffic, a few meters from an area with tables with a fountain not connected to the network, a sign prohibiting camping but no overnight stays.

title: (08695) Bagà - Camí de Monell
description: The pont de sant joan

name: Camping L'Hostalet
title: (08673) Camping L'Hostalet
description: Camping Masía L'Hostalet. Camping in nature, ideal to go with children as there is a playground and a small farm that you can visit, it has a bar with a fireplace for cold winter days, and the owners are very nice, they have a small shop, for an emergency it's fine

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - B-402
description: Parking tourist railway, empty to spend the night quietly

title: (08513) Prats de Lluçanès -
description: Motorhome area with toilets and showers, market on Sundays.

title: (08696) Barcelona - 97 Diseminado Afores
description: Parking for the gardens

title: (08695) Bagà - 2 BV-4024
description: Large grassy parking in the countryside above the road, very quiet in the middle of the mountains below river. On the right of the road towards the pass. Access is short (4m) but scabrous, ok for a van !! Gran aparcamiento cubierto de hierba en el campo sobre the carretera, muy tranquilo en el medio de las montañas debajo del río. At the end of the carretera hacia el paso. El acceso is corto (4 m) pero escabroso, está bien para una furgoneta.

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 9 Carrer d'Antoni Costa
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 9 Carrer d'Antoni Costa
description: Parking in the center of the city without services, but very quiet next to the river Llobregat without problems to spend the night

title: (08692) Cal Riera -
description: Next to the Castle, several places next to a very flat road, between trees, there are picnic tables and garbage next to the Castle, in the middle of August very very quiet

title: (08695) Bagà - 31 BV-4024
description: Picnic with barbecues and tables in the meadow. on the other side of the road there is a parking lot for 15 or 20 motor homes

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 6 Carrer Escorxador
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 6 Carrer Escorxador
description: Parking area of about 20 places approx. AC and cars. Without time limitation. There is a water and electricity supply point for a fee (see photo). It is on the other side of the first parking lot that you find when you arrive at the town. Currently they are improving access, a bit difficult to get in with an AC. Ideal to visit the town or start a route through the area.

title: (08695) Bagà - Camí de Gisclareny
description: Beautiful parking at the neck of Benna; 4 places, no water, no sevice, access mountain road from Baga; night without problem, thick duvet

title: (25286) Navès - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice for one night !!

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 3 BV-4031
description: Parking day and night, shared with cars and the occasional trailer., There are always 4/5 free spaces. Without services but the deal with the neighbors is unbeatable. 2 minutes from the town center.

title: (08697) Saldes - Carretera del mirador de Gresolet / Refugi Lluís Estasen
title_short: (08697) Saldes - Carretera del mirador de Gresolet / Refugi Lluís Estasen
description: Night at the Mirador de Gressolet. Good place without problem!

title: (08695) Bagà -
description: This car park, unlike the other nearby, is accessible to camper vans, this one is no problem. we can accommodate 10. Located very against the bottom of the road, we absolutely do not hear it is the only place in the middle of nature so quiet for miles around. Plus pretty much flat.

title: (08696) Barcelona - 10 Diseminado Afores
description: Small square surrounded by greenery with a fountain and picnic tables. sleeping possible. Fountain with spring water and shadow. 5 minutes to Antonio Gaudi's Gardin de Antiguas.

title: (08696) Barcelona - s/n Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Parking of the Artigas gardens, a beautiful place to visit from the architect Gaudí. Access through the old town, difficult for a motorhome, better only a camper. Access to the car park is on the tourist train tracks for the last 100m. There are better places nearby to spend the night.

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
description: Large grassy area with several combinations of benches and tables by the river. No more than 2t.

title: (25286) Navès - C-462
description: Ideal place to spend the night is next to the CARDANER river, a quiet place, very easy access recommended.

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
description: Place a little before the one already present on P4N, more accessible but less friendly. On the side of the road but very little traffic and on the banks of the river. Very nice to spend a night. Ability to put 2 or 3 van but a little on each other

title: (08695) Bagà -
description: Roadside siding with spectacular views from the Devesa viewpoint. Flat, calm and quiet parking.

title: (25286) Navès - C-462
description: A small spot can be reached with the CamperVan. Wonderful view of the reservoir.

title: (08697) Saldes -
description: Parking with views of Pedraforca, next to the barbecue and picnic area of Santuari and Refugi del Gresolet. The road from Saldes IS NOT ASPHALED and in some sections it is complicated by potholes, puddles and stones. Road NOT SUITABLE FOR AC, but a 6-meter Camper arrives patiently. Absolute tranquility at night and starry sky.

title: (08696) Castellar de n'Hug - 3 BV-4031
description: Parking at an old cement factory, which is now a museum. You can stand in the parking lot or drive a short distance (100m) a gravel road, then msn is in nature.

title: (08695) Guardiola de Berguedà - BV-4024
description: Ultra pirineu pass near the shelter

title: (17512) Les Llosses -
description: Stumbled upon it by chance on our way. Nice and quiet place with site for motorhome. Point for walks and church. No water.

title: (08587) Alpens -
description: Very quiet parking where you can spend the night with our van, with fountain and located under a restaurant if we are too lazy to cook.

title: (25716) Gósol - Moli de Gosol, s/n
description: A very quiet place next to a shelter. Small, with the river next to it. A paradise. No services.

title: (08612) Montmajor - Unnamed Road
description: Nice and spacious place to picnic or sleep. Very close to Cardona. He advised to visit the town of Cardona, it is impressive especially on Sunday.

title: (17512) Les Llosses - C-26
description: Shaded siding for lounging. It is right next to the road. We only had a nap but we think we could sleep. Further on there is another larger siding but we consider this to be flatter. As the day passes, the shadow grows wider.

title: (08672) L'Ametlla de Merola - 14 Carrer Vell
description: Parking in an industrial colony. For small vans. Maybe in some area I could park some AC. Nearby there is a bridge and in the same neighborhood there is a bar, fountain, playground.

title: (08587) Alpens - BP-4654
description: It is good for a night out, although it is very close to the road.

title: (25286) Navès - C-462
description: Small parking with 4 spaces and very quiet in the middle of nature.

title: (25286) Navès -
description: Ideal place to rest

title: (08695) Guardiola de Berguedà - BV-4024
description: Parking next to the track that leads to the Mirador dels Orris (~15' walk). it's also a midpoint in the trail "Ruta del Trencapinyes" (really worth it). There's room for about six cars/vans properly parked. Not very flat but at dusk we placed our campervan (6 m) in quite a suitable way with leveling blocks, repositioning at down as soon as we got up to leave space for early birdies. We spent the night utterly alone. Better than parking at the Mirador dels Orris. There's another reasonable parking space a few meters road up too.

title: (25716) Gósol - 10 B-400
description: Parquing at the entrance of Gòsol, quiet to bivouac, visit the village, eat etc ...

title: (25282) Sant Llorenç de Morunys - 18 Carrer Vall Calenta
title_short: (25282) Sant Llorenç de Morunys - 18 Carrer Vall Calenta
description: A perfect place to replace water and necessities of the motorhome. In the village an excellent atmosphere. Ideal to rest after a day of skiing ... There is a location where they explain and give the website link for the online payment.

name: Càmping Morunys
title: (25282) Càmping Morunys
description: Sant Llorenç de Morunys, C-462. Morunys campsite. Pleasant campsite. Good price. Excellent environment in Sant Llorenç de Morunys.

title: (25284) Lérida - 3 C-462
description: Font de la Puda Sulfur water source and picnic tables. Small pool to make baths with these waters and parking lot to make it overnight. Next to the river.

title: (08694) Guardiola de Berguedà - BV-4024
description: Ideal place to stop and eat. Started the route of the marmot (At the time of the new road, the road ends at Coll de Pal and there is no way to access it. It is dangerous for large vehicles and without chains)

title: (08274) Sant Feliu Sasserra - 10 Carrer Sant Roc
title_short: (08274) Sant Feliu Sasserra - 10 Carrer Sant Roc
description: Aparcament of the soccer field and municipal swimming pool. Tranquil·litat, 5 minutes from the center of town, municipal sports area, starting point d'itineraris a peu ...

title: (08589) Perafita - 53 Carrer Major
description: Picnic parking right at the entrance of the town. Spacious and with picnic tables. Good views. Town well known for the typical cocas. There are several bakeries where you can taste them

title: (25716) Gósol - Unnamed Road
description: With a view of Pedraforca. In the middle of nature. Access track without any complications, closed in winter due to frost.
